QuestData.Title: Pest Problems
QuestData.Description: One of my farmhands, Wika-Wika, has been tilling the soil in my westernmost field. I understand he's had some problems with pests.$b$bHe's got plenty of pesticide to spray the bugs that eat my crops, but I'm afraid he has no way to deal with the marmots.$b$bWould you lend him a hand? With rampant hozen and virmen attacks, I can't afford to lose crops to simple pests.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Wika-Wika, then stomp on 25 Black-Nose Marmots.
